lead_paragraph: For much of the first half of the season, Cleveland Cavaliers forward Kevin Love was part of trade rumors, despite the team's success.

headline.print_headline: Hot Love Propels Cavs to Thumping Win Over Thunder
headline.main: Hot Love Propels Cavs to Thumping Win Over Thunder
